segments.text: Nicole , your Fettucini is very ... unique .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But not as good as your mother's , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . It was the only dish she wasn't good at . So we could use you as the new head chef ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , Uncle Giovanni . That's wonderful ! Thank you ! Thank you !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , OK . Get back to work . There's someone waiting for you in the kitchen ...
segments.speaker: S1
